name: structural
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: structural
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: relating to the way in which parts of a system or object are arranged

example.eg: The political reforms have led to major structural changes in the economy.
example.egtrans: 政治改革导致了经济结构的重大变化。

dsense.name: structural
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: relating to the structure of a building or similar object
trans_examp.trans_cn: （建筑物或类似物体）结构上的

example.eg: Hundreds of houses in the typhoon's path suffered structural damage.
example.egtrans: 台风所过之处，数百所房屋遭到了结构性破坏。
